short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin will automatically travel to the Office 365 login page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you find it as incredibly annoying as I do that Moodle logs out every 30 seconds??

This extension will automatically load the Office365 login page when Moodle logs you out. So, if you set Office 365 to "Stay Logged In", you will automatically be logged back into Moodle on the page you were using when it SO RUDELY interrupted you.
